Contact co-leads Terri or Danielle if you are not on the DM email list and want to attend.

entry.title: Annual Meeting, April 14, 2025
entry.content:
Please join us for this year’s Hybrid ESS Cyberinfrastructure Working Groups (CIWG) Annual Meeting. You can view the full Agenda on the meeting’s event page.

Note the the meeting is scheduled to run from 9:00AM EDT to 5:30PM EDT.
